dialogue.text: Hey Yumi. What are you up to?
Oh, fuck no. Don't just walk up to me in the hall of the {i}girls'{/i} dorm and act like you fuckin' own the place.
All I did was say hi.
Which is a billion times more than you're allowed to say, douchenozzle.
There is absolutely no fucking way you are allowed over here. I don't believe it for even a second.
Who's on the hit list today? Class prez? Fat-aba?
I was actually kind of hoping the two of us could hang out.
And I was actually kind of hoping I'd be able to stand in the hall of the building I fucking {i}live{/i} in without worrying about some predator trying to sneak into my room.
Get the fuck out of here. Now.
I'm starting to think you don't want to be around me tonight.
Oh my fucking God. It's like talking to a brick wall- just the brick wall has a micropenis that gets hard every time it sees a pair of tits.
Your analogy game needs some work, Yumi.
My {i}what?{/i} This that new teaching strategy I've been hearin' about?
You coming to our rooms to lecture us now since you're too busy sniffing our fucking gym clothes in the locker room during school hours.
To my dismay and your fortune, I can assure you here and now that I don't have access to that room.
Finally, some good fucking news.
So, what do you want to do? Go for a walk? Give me a tour of your dorm room?
You mean right now? I don't know. Blowin' my brains out sounds pretty fuckin' appealing.
We're not hanging out tonight, are we?
Of fucking course not! Now get the hell out of here and never come back!
Yumi disappears into her dorm room, which I don't really blame her for since I definitely {i}shouldn't{/i} be here.
But hey, if no one is going to stop me, I'm going to keep on coming.
It's not like there's much else to do at night anyway.
For now, though, I guess I'll head back home.
Yumi can only avoid me for so long...
{i}Yumi’s affection has somehow increased to [yumi_love]!{/i}
